attributes.action: Put more Police on the ground to stop, search and potentially save a life!
attributes.additional_details: We need to crack down on the countries knife crime! We need to prevent these deaths from happening, gain those weapons, give harsher punishment, we need to come down hard!! Save lives not destroy them!! We are losing our youth of today, our children our loves at the hands of blades and gangs!! It’s time stop, make a stand and join together to make it better!
attributes.background: Place more man power on the ground, give police officers stronger enforcement to stop, search, remove and instant punishment on the spot. SAVE LIVES

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the police.

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to fund more police to tackle knife crime, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
